info.description: Multi-tenant admin portal with Keycloak authentication and MSP support. API uses CalVer (Calendar Versioning) - each date represents a potentially breaking change version.
info.title: Booli Admin API

get.description: Get paginated list of tenants (admin: all tenants, MSP: their tenants)
Get tenant by ID
Get paginated list of users with optional search and filtering

parameters.description: Search term for username or email
parameters.name: search_term

get.description: Get user by ID

post.description: Export audit logs to various formats

get.description: Get paginated list of audit logs
Get audit log by ID
Handle OAuth2/OIDC callback and exchange code for tokens
Get list of available OIDC authentication providers
Get OIDC well-known configuration for a specific provider
Get user information from access token

post.description: Validate an access token or ID token

get.description: Get paginated list of tenant environments

post.description: Create a new tenant environment with network ranges, IPs, domains, and infrastructure
Grant access to an environment for another user or tenant

delete.description: Revoke access grant to an environment

get.description: Get all infrastructure IPs for the tenant's environments
Lookup enrichment data for a specific IP address or domain
Get all network ranges for the tenant's environments
Get security information and event management (SIEM) enrichment data including network ranges, IPs, domains, and infrastructure
Get tenant environment by ID
Get application health status
Validate Keycloak configuration and connectivity
Get list of SSO providers for tenant
Get SSO provider by ID
Get paginated list of users with optional search and filtering

parameters.description: Search term for username or email
parameters.name: search_term

get.description: Get user by ID
Get information about the current API version using Calendar Versioning (CalVer)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
